title: Imsai Arasan 23rd Pulikecei
plot: Historical Comedy about a Dravidian Ruler and his family.
synopsis: Long after, king mukkayappan (Nagesh) giving birth the twins. Sagilimayan(Nasar) is kings personal adviser and he is younger brother of king's wife. He ask to kill one of the child to rule the kingdom. But astrologist reveals that during the crescendo period killing the new born is not good for the kingdom. He advised to loose the younger one elsewhere. One child lives in kingdom under the shadow of is uncle. Another lives with the aid mans home. They both grow in different environment. Elder brother 23 m pulikesi (Vadivelu) doing all sorts of mischief in kingdom. While elder brother uukirabuthan (Vadivelu) bought up in village. Story deals with current political suture. Uukirabuthan fights his uncle and saves his kingdom from being enslaved.
